question: Which Union Ministry has tied up with Zomato, to implement the PM- SVANidhi scheme?
option1: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
option3: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
As a part of Prime Minister Street Vendor’s AtmaNibhar Nidhi (PM SVANidhi) Scheme, Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs (MoHUA) entered into an agreement with Zomato.
This partnership will enable the company to onboard street food vendors on its platform and improve their business with a wider market access. MoHUA also launched the Mobile Application for PMSVANidhi se Samriddhi. It links the scheme’s beneficiaries with various Government schemes.
